title: Func def. by int.: 3 line segments part - b

content.question: For the function g defined in part (a), find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of g on the open interval -4<x<3. Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: For the function g defined in part (a), find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of g on the open interval -4<x<3. Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
